content: Set an alternative URL address for your space. Send your request to our support team to get help with the settings.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a button or link that allows users to set an alternative URL address for their space. It provides instructions on how to send a request to support for assistance with DNS settings. This text appears in a dialog box or settings page, likely within the PortalSettings category of customization options.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'alternative URL address' is not accurately conveyed. While 'عنوان URL بديل' is technically correct, a more natural and clear phrasing in Arabic would be something along the lines of 'عنوان موقع بديل'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بتعيين عنوان موقع بديل للمساحة الخاصة بك.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Set an alternative URL address for your space' is not accurately translated. 'Domeniniz üçün alternativ URL ünvanı təyin edin' literally translates to 'Set an alternative URL address for your domain'. 'Space' implies a broader concept than just a domain, which might be a platform or a specific area within a larger application. The translation could be more general.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Davamlılığınız üçün alternativ URL ünvanı təyin edin. (Set an alternative URL address for your platform/application)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Parametrlərlə' in 'Parametrlərlə bağlı kömək üçün' is not the most natural way to say 'regarding settings'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Parametrlərinizlə bağlı kömək üçün (Regarding your settings)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Send your request to our support team" is not accurately reflected by "Veuillez envoyer votre demande à notre équipe d'assistance technique". While close, 'demande' is a bit formal here and 'assistance technique' is a more technical term than 'support team'. A more natural phrasing would be closer to 'Envoyez votre requête à notre service d'assistance'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Envoyez votre requête à notre service d'assistance.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "to get help with the settings" is not directly translated.  'Sur des réglages' is grammatically correct, but suggests help *about* settings rather than *with* the settings.  A more accurate translation would focus on assistance *with* configuring the settings.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: pour vous aider à configurer ces réglages

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after 'տարածքի համար' is unnecessary and disrupts the flow. It's more natural to omit it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon after 'տարածքի համար'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Send your request to our support team to get help with the settings" is translated somewhat literally, which makes it sound slightly unnatural in Japanese. A more natural phrasing would be to offer direct assistance rather than requesting a request.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: あなたのスペースの代替URLアドレスを設定してください。設定についてのお手伝いが必要な場合は、弊社のサポートチームまでお問い合わせください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "弊社のサポートチーム" (heisha no support team) is a bit formal. While appropriate, a slightly less formal "当社のサポートチーム" (tousha no support team) might be preferable depending on the target audience and the overall tone of the application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: あなたのスペースの代替URLアドレスを設定してください。設定についてのお手伝いが必要な場合は、当社のサポートチームまでお問い合わせください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Set an alternative URL address for your space" is translated somewhat literally and could be more natural. "공간에 대한 대체 URL 주소를 설정하세요" is technically correct, but a more user-friendly phrasing might be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 공간의 대체 URL 주소를 설정하세요 (Gonggan-ui daechae URL ju-so-reul seonjeonghaseyo)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Send your request to our support team to get help with the settings" is also translated literally. While technically accurate, a more natural phrasing might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 설정 관련 도움이 필요하면 지원팀에 문의해주세요 (Seonjeong gwan-ryun doumi pillyomyeon jiwontimeun muleusayeyo)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'vietrāža' is not the standard or most accurate translation of 'URL' in this context. 'URL' is often used directly, or a more descriptive term like 'adrese' or 'interneta adrese' might be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Iestatiet savai telpai alternatīvu URL adresi. Nosūtiet pieprasījumu mūsu atbalsta komandai, lai saņemtu palīdzību ar iestatījumiem.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'adresi' is a reasonable alternative to 'vietrāža', it is still slightly less precise. The English emphasizes a *URL* specifically, not just any address.  Consider more descriptive language if necessary for clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Iestatiet savai telpai alternatīvu interneta adresi (URL). Nosūtiet pieprasījumu mūsu atbalsta komandai, lai saņemtu palīdzību ar iestatījumiem.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'get help with the settings' is translated as 'aby uzyskać pomoc z konfiguracją'. While understandable, 'z konfiguracją' is slightly awkward. A more natural translation would be 'w konfiguracji' or a restructuring of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Skonfiguruj alternatywny adres URL dla swojego obszaru. Wyślij prośbę do naszego działu wsparcia, aby uzyskać pomoc w konfiguracji.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ajutorul de setare" is not the most natural translation of "help with the settings." It's a bit literal and clunky. It implies help *for* the setting itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Trimiteţi solicitarea către echipa noastră de asistenţă, pentru a obține ajutor cu setările.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "alternative URL address" is somewhat literal and could be more natural. 'URL address' can be shortened to 'URL'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබගේ අවකාශය සඳහා විකල්ප URL සකසන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'සැකසුම සඳහා උදවු ලබා ගැනීමට' is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would better convey the meaning of 'to get help with the settings'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සැකසුම් පිළිබඳව උදවු ලබා ගැනීමට

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Send your request to our support team' is too literal. A more natural Serbian translation would be 'Контактирајте нашу службу подршке' or 'Обавезно контактирајте службу подршке'. The current translation 'Пошаљите ваш захтев нашем тиму за подршку' sounds awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Контактирајте нашу службу подршке

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Set an alternative URL address' is translated as 'Postavite alternativnu URL adresu'. While technically correct, a more natural translation might be 'Odredite alternativnu URL adresu' or 'Unesite alternativnu URL adresu'. 'Postavite' can imply configuration in a more general sense, not just assigning a URL.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odredite alternativnu URL adresu za vaš prostor.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'to get help with the settings' is translated as 'da dobijete pomoć sa podešavanjima'. While understandable, a more accurate and natural translation would be 'za pomoć sa podešavanjima' or 'za pomoć u podešavanjima'. The use of 'sa' is not incorrect, but the phrasing is slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pošaljite vaš zahtev našem timu za podršku za pomoć sa podešavanjima.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'alternative URL address' is not perfectly captured by 'alternatif bir URL adresi'. A more accurate translation would be 'alternatif bir web adresi' or 'başka bir web adresi'. 'URL adresi' is technically correct, but 'web adresi' flows better in Turkish in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Alanınız için alternatif bir web adresi ayarlayın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Ukrainian translation uses a period after 'простору' which is unusual in this context. A comma would be more appropriate to connect it to the following sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Задайте альтернативну URL-адресу для свого простору, надішліть запит до нашої служби підтримки, щоб отримати допомогу з параметрами.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Send your request to our support team' is too literal. A more natural Vietnamese phrasing would be 'Liên hệ với bộ phận hỗ trợ của chúng tôi'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Liên hệ với bộ phận hỗ trợ của chúng tôi để được trợ giúp về cài đặt.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “cài đặt” refers to settings in general. While technically correct, “thiết lập” is more specific and matches the original English ‘settings’.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Liên hệ với bộ phận hỗ trợ của chúng tôi để được trợ giúp về thiết lập.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '关于设置方面的帮助' is slightly awkward. It can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 关于设置的帮助
